page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT
page.content: T WITHIN THE BLOCK AGRICULTURE IS THE BIGGEST SINGLE EMPLOYER.AFTER THAT EDUCATION,TRANSPORT,BUILDING,MOTOR VEHICLE REPAIRS,SHOPS, CAFES AND PUBLIC HOUSES,THE DOCTORS'SURGERY AND THE DENTIST. ONE UNUSUAL EMPLOYER IS 'RE-TUBE'A FIRM THAT RECONDITIONS CATHODE RAY TUBES FOR USE IN T.V. SETS. MANY PEOPLE IN NORTH SOMERCOTES HAVE SEVERAL STRINGS TO THEIR EMPLOYMENT BOW THERE BEING MUCH PART-TIME WORK AS BUS DRIVERS(SCHOOL BUSES),AS FIREMEN,AS COASTGUARDS AND AS MARKET GARDENERS. THE VILLAGE HAS A DORMITORY FUNCTION AS WELL - PEOPLE TRAVEL TO LOUTH AND GRIMSBY AND TO THE NORTH SEA GAS TERMINAL AT THEDDLETHORPE. OTHER PEOPLE TRAVEL INTO THE VILLAGE TO WORK IN THE SCHOOLS AND THE HOLIDAY CAMP.
